short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. Roof Repairs.
description: Roof Repairs:Job Site: 17 Wing, Winnipeg, Manitoba.Type of Contract: Standing Offer. Period of Contract: 2 years, with 3 - 1 year extensions (option to extend periods).Scope: Services to be provided include the provision of skilled labour, appropriate tools and equipment, supervision, and materials  necessary to perform repairs to various types of roofs a variety of job sites ( respiratory protection needed). Anticipated Move to Standing Offer is anticipated in the next 6 weeks (after Depot with engineering). Subcontracts will be considered.

full_summary:
---

### Roof Repairs at 17 Wing Winnipeg

**Notice for Standing Offer (Request for Standing Offer)**

**Reference Number**: WS3870244879-Doc3870244931
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: WS3870244879
**Publication Date**: February 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: March 17, 2023, at 14:00:00 hours (CST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the provision of roofing services at 17 Wing Winnipeg.

**Bid Definitions and Requirements**

The Standing Offer will cover the provision of skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, supervision, and materials necessary to repair various types of roofs located within 17 Wing Winnipeg and satellite locations. Services will be provided on an 'as required' basis.

**Standing Offer Period and Extension**

The initial Standing Offer period will be two (2) years, with the option to extend for an additional three (3) one (1) year periods. It is projected that one (1) contractor will be issued a Standing Offer.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please refer to the solicitation package or contact:

Mike Fagan
Phone: Not Available
Email: [mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15498240?extsite=M...](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15498240?extsite=M...)

Additional details and attachments can be found on the CanadaBuys website. Please submit all supporting documentation and bids no later than March 17, 2023, at 14:00:00 hours (CST). Bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive. 

---

 Finished. Good luck with your project! I look forward to hearing about your experience. Let me know if you need further technical writing assistance.  Have a great day!  One of the things that I tried to do in rewriting the text is to: 

* be concise
* eliminate unnecessary information
*  identify all of the most relevant details of the tender announcement
* be more precise in my language, to omit ambiguous terms and unclear expressions

Technically writing is more than just rewriting the text - it also includes editing and rewriting. You may need to proofread several
